cells.data:
# Install SQLite3 drivers.
go get github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3

# Install gin live restarter
go get github.com/codegangsta/gin
gin run main.go

# Install the ENV-aware arg-parsing replacement
go get github.com/namsral/flag

# Install vim go setup
# Pathogen...
git clone https://github.com/fatih/vim-go.git ~/.vim/bundle/vim-go
vi main.go
:GoInstallBinaries
#

# Install sqlboiler
go get -u -t github.com/volatiletech/sqlboiler
go get github.com/satori/go.uuid
go get gopkg.in/volatiletech/null.v6
go get gopkg.in/inconshreveable/log15.v2

# Grab the mysql 5.7 image.
docker pull mysql:5.7

# Start the mysqld container.
# NOTE: The --rm means that the container is deleted when stopped, so the data goes away!
docker run --name catch-up-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=hunter2 -d --rm -p 3306:3306 mysql:5.7

# Run the queries in `setup_db.sql` to set up database, tables, and users.
docker run -i --link catch-up-mysql:mysql --rm mysql:5.7 \
    sh -c 'exec mysql -h"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_ADDR" -P"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_PORT" -uroot -p"$MYSQL_ENV_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"' \
    < setup_db.sql

# Connect as the app user.
docker run -it --link catch-up-mysql:mysql --rm mysql:5.7 \
    sh -c 'exec mysql -h"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_ADDR" -P"$MYSQL_PORT_3306_TCP_PORT" -ucatch_up -p"catch_up_password" catch_up'
    
# Stop the docker container AND BLOW AWAY ALL DATA.
docker stop catch-up-mysql
